tool.name: t_coffee_to_cigar
tool.description: Converts fasta alignment output from TCoffee into CIGAR strings.

param.name: input
param.label: Tabular data
param.help: 2-column tabular format data, where first column is fasta_id and second is alignment.

tool.help: Simple wrapper for TCoffeee to convert fasta alignment output into CIGAR. TCoffee output needs to be converted into tabular form where first column is fasta_id and second is alignment.
